quotes.quote: Every now and then go away, have a little relaxation, for when you come back to your work your judgment will be surer. Go some distance away because then the work appears smaller and more of it can be taken in at a glance and a lack of harmony and proportion is more readily seen.
The mind should be allowed some relaxation, that it may return to its work all the better for the rest.
Relaxation means releasing all concern and tension and letting the natural order of life flow through one's being.
Your mind will answer most questions if you learn to relax and wait for the answer.
Learn to relax. Your body is precious, as it houses your mind and spirit. Inner peace begins with a relaxed body.
During [these] periods of relaxation after concentrated intellectual activity, the intuitive mind seems to take over and can produce the sudden clarifying insights which give so much joy and delight.
Tension is who you think you should be. Relaxation is who you are.
It is necessary to relax your muscles when you can. Relaxing your brain is fatal.

When was the last time you spent a quiet moment just doing nothing - just sitting and looking at the sea, or watching the wind blowing the tree limbs, or waves rippling on a pond, a flickering candle or children playing in the park?
Take rest; a field that has rested gives a bountiful crop.
It is requisite for the relaxation of the mind that we make use, from time to time, of playful deeds and jokes.

Relax and refuse to let worry and stress rule your life. There is always a solution to every problem. Things will work out for you when you take time to relax, refresh, restore and recharge your soul.
He enjoys true leisure who has time to improve his soul's estate.
Man is so made that he can only find relaxation from one kind of labor by taking up another.
If a man insisted always on being serious, and never allowed himself a bit of fun and relaxation, he would go mad or become unstable without knowing it.
I relax my body completely, relax my mind completely, and then imagine myself at a level where anything can happen.
Take the next 24 hours and just relax with the knowing that everything is okay. Let go of the stress and worry for one day and see what happens.
The ability to relax and be mindfully present in the moment comes naturally when we are grateful.
Sometimes the most productive thing you can do is relax.
How beautiful it is to do nothing, and then to rest afterward.
Taking time out each day to relax and renew is essential to living well.
It's a good idea always to do something relaxing prior to making an important decision in your life.
If you do what you love, it is the best way to relax.
If you want to relax, watch the clouds pass by if you're laying on the grass, or sit in front of the creek; just doing nothing and having those still moments is what really rejuvenates the body.
The time to relax is when you don't have time for it.
No matter how much pressure you feel at work, if you could find ways to relax for at least five minutes every hour, you'd be more productive.
What is the answer to this fatigue? Relax! Relax! Relax! Learn to relax while you are doing your work!
The time to relax is when you don't have time for it.
The more relaxed you can get, the better you'll do.
